name: Multi language country names for zen cart
tagline: This module gives Zen Cart Multi lingual Country names
body:
# Multi-Language-Country-Names-for-Zen-Cart
Multi Language Country Names will allow you as a shop admin to enter country names in multiple languages. There will be a new entry for each installed language in your Zen Cart installation.
In the store front, language names will be shown based upon the selected language.
When an account is made, and/or an order is placed by a customer, the country name will be saved in that account/order, based on the selected language at the time of creation.
